about_the_game:
Welcome to Butcher Simulator!

Start with a carcass, learn the art of precise cuts, and transform them into premium meat pieces to sell. Upgrade your tools, enhance your skills, and expand your shop. From ground beef to gourmet cuts, every slice counts.

Master Butchery Skills

Start with basic cuts and gradually master more complex techniques as you gain experience. Each new skill learned unlocks more valuable meat cuts, increasing your profit margins.

Upgrade Your Tools

Invest in better knives, saws, and other butchery tools to enhance your efficiency and precision. The right tools make all the difference in producing high-quality meat.

Expand

As your reputation grows, so does your business. Expand your shop, add new workstations, and improve your facilities to handle more carcasses and serve more customers.

Variety of Meat Cuts

From steaks and tender ribs to versatile ground beef, every piece of meat has its place. Learn to optimize each carcass to maximize your yield and profits.

Hire and Manage Staff

As your business grows, hire skilled butchers to serve customers and manage daily operations. Train your staff to ensure they meet the high standards of your shop.

Business Management

Balance your time between honing your butchery skills and managing the business side of your shop. Make strategic decisions on pricing, inventory, and customer satisfaction to carve out a successful butchery empire.


Are you ready to carve out your success?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Run your own butcher shop! Start with a carcass, cut premium meat pieces, and sell them to grow your business. Upgrade tools, buy supplies, and attract customers. Can you become the ultimate butcher? Find out in Butcher Simulator!

English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
